name: Tender Was the Knight
description:
Tender Was the Knight was made for the NES Jam, and features the tale of two dragons working in tandem, searching for their eggs which were stolen by the wicked knights.  Travel from their volcano home, to the hedge mazes that protect the castle, to the very heart of the castle itself in a frantic battle against the Golden Knight.

Brevitius - Project Lead, Artist

Niiue - Artist

Nakrypt, Lightwaves, Aim - Programming

Wyron - Audio Design
